sqlMap.statement: SELECT PLW.FIRST_LINE_ADDR , PLW.SCD_LINE_ADDR , PLW.CTY_ADDR , PLW.ST_CD , PLW.POST_CD , PLW.CTRY_CD , CNTY.CNTY_NM , PLW.CNTY_PK , SELL.SELL_TO_CUST_CD , BILL.BILL_TO_CUST_CD , SHIP.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD , PLW.PTY_LOC_PK FROM S21_CSA_CONV.PTY_LOC_WRK@CSAQA.CUSA.CANON.COM PLW , S21_CSA_CONV.ACCT_LOC@CSAQA.CUSA.CANON.COM AL , S21_CSA_CONV.CNTY@CSAQA.CUSA.CANON.COM CNTY , S21_CSA_CONV.SELL_TO_CUST@CSAQA.CUSA.CANON.COM SELL , S21_CSA_CONV.BILL_TO_CUST@CSAQA.CUSA.CANON.COM BILL , S21_CSA_CONV.SHIP_TO_CUST@CSAQA.CUSA.CANON.COM SHIP WHERE PLW.PTY_LOC_PK = AL.PTY_LOC_PK AND PLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PLW.CNTY_PK = CNTY.CNTY_PK AND PLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CNTY.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PLW.PTY_LOC_PK = SELL.PTY_LOC_PK(+) AND PLW.PTY_LOC_PK = BILL.PTY_LOC_PK(+) AND PLW.PTY_LOC_PK = SHIP.PTY_LOC_PK(+) AND PLW.CTRY_CD = #ctryUS# AND PLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY PLW.PTY_LOC_PK
